prompt:

    And this is a biography that contains all the information from this profile. 
    ```
    Tariq Al-Mansour is a 34-year-old Saudi Arabian Senior Engineer at Saudi Aramco, based in Dhahran. response:
```
Tariq Al-Mansour, 34, is a Senior Engineer at Saudi Aramco in Dhahran, Saudi Arabia. With nine years of experience in the petroleum engineering industry, he has established himself as a specialist in innovative extraction methods and energy efficiency. Tariq completed his PhD in Petroleum Engineering at Stanford University in 2014, which significantly enhanced his technical skills and global outlook. Proficient in English, he regularly participates in international conferences and collaborates on cross-cultural projects. Outside of his professional life, Tariq enjoys playing chess, photographing the scenic landscapes of Saudi Arabia, and embarking on desert camping adventures that reflect his appreciation for nature and heritage. His dedication to professional excellence and personal growth distinguishes him as a leader in the energy sector.
```
